Art & Event Rooms
THE WYNMOOR COUNTRY CLUB COMPLEX AMENITIES ARE AVAILABLE.
The Wynmoor Country Club is home to several of the classrooms for the particular art forms offered to Wynmoor residents. At the Country Club, you will find the Stained Glass Studio, the Wood Shop, Glass Kiln Studio, Ceramics Studio, Painting Studio, and Stone/Clay Sculpture Studio. The Country Club also features a Library, two Card Rooms, a huge Pool and Billiards Room, the Lecture Hall (175-fixed seat room with stage), and three Ballrooms, which open up into one large Grand Ballroom, for a variety of events and functions. The ballrooms are available for rent by our residents. See the Room Reservations section of this website for more information.
Library
Billiards
Art Studio
Ceramics
Glass Kiln
Stained Glass
Stone Clay Sculpture
Wood Shop

An active adult community catering to your lifestyle
Wynmoor is an adult community catering to your lifestyle – whatever you choose it to be. Only 6 miles from beautiful beaches and just off the Florida Turnpike, ours is an ideal location. Wynmoor’s professionally landscaped and meticulously maintained grounds make Wynmoor a paradise.

Search this website
Facebook
Special Events
There is so much to do at Wynmoor! Don’t want to leave the community to be active?
You don’t have to. The following events are held on Wynmoor Property.
Afternoon Tea –
Summer Hiatus; we’ll resume in the Fall. Stay tuned for details.
Thursday Night Bingo
Grand Ballroom A.
Doors open at 5:00 pm, Game begins at 6:30 pm
All residents are welcome!
Wynmoor’s Karaoke
How to Register for Recreation Events
Register in the Main Recreation Office at the Main Pool, on Mondays, Wednesdays, and Fridays from 2:00 PM – 4:00 PM (by the Main Pool). For more information call Recreation at 954-978-2600, and press 1.
Recreation events are subject to change.
Yearly Special Events:
The Annual Festival of the Arts
Super Bowl Sunday Party
Festival of the Arts
Memorial Day Remembrance
Fall Harvest Celebration
Teachers’ Showcase
New Year’s Eve Celebration

Contact Information
View Larger Map
From time to time, we send news and information to our residents via email. Please Fill out the CONTACT FORM if you would like to be included. Be sure to type “Wynmoor News Updates” in the Subject Line.
Wynmoor Village has a population of over 9,000, residing in 5,260 units, consisting of 44 independent Condominium Associations.
Wynmoor “Community Council”, the master association, has a 44-member Board of Directors, (One representative from each association). The Council Board of Directors oversees the maintenance and operation of the Council facilities, including the Theatre, Golf Course, Tennis Courts, Fitness Center, Main and Walking Pools, Clubhouse, Transportation Fleet, etc. The 5,260 unit owners in Wynmoor wholly own these amenities.
Our volunteers, as well as our fully trained professional staff of over 200, are dedicated to the common goal of promoting excellent “customer” service.
1310 Avenue of Stars
Coconut Creek, Florida 33066
Telephone:(954) 978-2600
